characters.story: "MOW!" the shells command sharply about mien - appearance and demeanor!
The moon bends down drooping - lucent, bright, clear and luminous!
"Long?" the pack of wild dogs questions curiously - is it a wolf, a wild canine or a weasel?
"GEE!" the food and wind sing cheerfully - starving, hungry and desperate!
"Rao?" the food questions curiously - will you spare, forgive and show mercy?
"SHEET!" the food commands sharply - ornaments to decorate and adorn!
The food bends down drooping - the beverage, drink and liquid.
"Shih?" the food and insect question curiously, eating away to erode and corrode.
The food wraps and bends down drooping - sated, full, but suffering criticism.
"Man?" the food questions curiously - is it bread, a steamed bun?
The food puzzle bends down drooping - the cookie, cake and mochi!
The food bends down drooping - the dumpling, potsticker to celebrate!
"UH!" the food commands sharply - hungry, starving and ravenous!
"Chen?" the water questions curiously, submerging to dive underwater and hide.
"Can?" the waitresses, day and insects question curiously - the silkworm making cocoons and silk!
"GAI!" the water commands sharply since - to irrigate and water the crops!
The state of mind bends down drooping since then - incensed with indignant resentment!
"Ping?" the flowers, water and water lily question curiously - is it duckweed, a floating plant?
